docs.text:
Welcome to MkDocs


For full documentation visit 
mkdocs.org
.


Commands




mkdocs new [dir-name]
 - Create a new project.


mkdocs serve
 - Start the live-reloading docs server.


mkdocs build
 - Build the documentation site.


mkdocs help
 - Print this help message.




Project layout


mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: For full documentation visit  mkdocs.org .

docs.text:
Git basic commands


How to add a new mkdocs note in your GitHub repository


From your docs folder, type:


vi example.md
git add example.md
git commit -m 
my example note on GitHub

git push
cd ..
mkdocs gh-deploy




Please find 
here
 the specific markdown syntax for GitHub.


More information about mkdocs are available 
here
.
docs.title: GIT General
Git basic commands

docs.text:
From your docs folder, type:  vi example.md
git add example.md
git commit -m  my example note on GitHub 
git push
cd ..
mkdocs gh-deploy  Please find  here  the specific markdown syntax for GitHub.  More information about mkdocs are available  here .
docs.title: How to add a new mkdocs note in your GitHub repository

docs.text:
Some VBA tips


Remove Spaces


Dim monText as String
monText = Trim(monText) 'remove space on the left and right
monText = LTrim(monText) 'remove space on the left
monText = RTrim(monText) 'remove space on the right




More information about the Trim method [here](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/h9wz3dez(v=vs.90).


Convert a column number to a column letter


ColumnLetter = Chr(ColumnNbr + 64)




Erase all information in the Sheet1


Sheets(“Sheet1”).Cells.ClearContents




Number of the last non-blank line in the column A


LastLine = Range(
A
 
 Rows.Count).End(xlUp).Row




Select the first empty cell in the column A


Range(
A
 
 Rows.Count).End(xlUp).Offset(1).Select




Number of the last non-blank column in the first row


LastColumn = Cells(1, Columns.Count).End(xlToLeft).Column




Select the first empty cell in the row 1


Cells(1, Columns.Count).End(xlToLeft).Offset(, 1).Select




Count the number of character in a string variable


Temp = Len(
licensing
) ‘Temp will be equal to 9




Provide the first characters on the left


Temp = Left(
licensing
, 3) ’Temp will be equal to “lic”
Temp = Left(
licensing
, 5) ’Temp will be equal to “licen”




Provide the first characters in the right


Temp = Right(
licensing
, 4) ’Temp will be equal to “sing”
Temp = Right(
licensing
, 6) ’Temp will be equal to “ensing”




Provide the characters at the indicated position


Temp = Mid(
France
, 2, 3) ’Temp will be equal to “anc”
‘the first number is the start position
‘the second number is the number of character need to be save




Provide the number of time a character appears


Temp = InStr(
princing
, 
i
)  ‘temp will be equal to 3




Change the interior color of a cell


Cells(line, column).Interior.ColorIndex = 3




The other color index is available 
here
.


Count the number of merged cells


if Cells(line, column).MergeCells then
    mergedCells = Cells(line, column).MergeArea.Cells.Count
end if




Column identifier


ActiveSheet.UsedRange.Select
lastColumn = Cells(1, Columns.Count).End(xlToLeft).Column

For Column = 1 To lastColumn
  If Selection.Cells(1, Column).Value = Title1Name Then Title1ColumnNbr = Column
  If Selection.Cells(1, Column).Value = Title2Name Then Title2ColumnNbr = Column
Next Column
docs.title: VBA Tips
Some VBA tips

docs.text:
Dim monText as String
monText = Trim(monText) 'remove space on the left and right
monText = LTrim(monText) 'remove space on the left
monText = RTrim(monText) 'remove space on the right  More information about the Trim method [here](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/h9wz3dez(v=vs.90).

docs.text: LastLine = Range( A    Rows.Count).End(xlUp).Row
docs.title: Number of the last non-blank line in the column A

docs.text: Range( A    Rows.Count).End(xlUp).Offset(1).Select
docs.title: Select the first empty cell in the column A

docs.text: LastColumn = Cells(1, Columns.Count).End(xlToLeft).Column
docs.title: Number of the last non-blank column in the first row

docs.text: Cells(1, Columns.Count).End(xlToLeft).Offset(, 1).Select
docs.title: Select the first empty cell in the row 1

docs.text: Temp = Len( licensing ) ‘Temp will be equal to 9
docs.title: Count the number of character in a string variable

docs.text:
Temp = Left( licensing , 3) ’Temp will be equal to “lic”
Temp = Left( licensing , 5) ’Temp will be equal to “licen”
docs.title: Provide the first characters on the left

docs.text:
Temp = Right( licensing , 4) ’Temp will be equal to “sing”
Temp = Right( licensing , 6) ’Temp will be equal to “ensing”
docs.title: Provide the first characters in the right

docs.text:
Temp = Mid( France , 2, 3) ’Temp will be equal to “anc”
‘the first number is the start position
‘the second number is the number of character need to be save
docs.title: Provide the characters at the indicated position

docs.text: Temp = InStr( princing ,  i )  ‘temp will be equal to 3
docs.title: Provide the number of time a character appears

docs.text: Cells(line, column).Interior.ColorIndex = 3  The other color index is available  here .
docs.title: Change the interior color of a cell

docs.text:
if Cells(line, column).MergeCells then
    mergedCells = Cells(line, column).MergeArea.Cells.Count
end if
docs.title: Count the number of merged cells

docs.text:
ActiveSheet.UsedRange.Select
lastColumn = Cells(1, Columns.Count).End(xlToLeft).Column

For Column = 1 To lastColumn
  If Selection.Cells(1, Column).Value = Title1Name Then Title1ColumnNbr = Column
  If Selection.Cells(1, Column).Value = Title2Name Then Title2ColumnNbr = Column
Next Column
